document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Lest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#dc94ff">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indeed </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a8ff">Obstacle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">given </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">always </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#50ff4c">guages </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4840ff">Degree </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Between </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a8ff">Ourself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6c88ff">Heaven. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
